title: Homingpenguins
desc:
Post 727
- If Homingpenguins is the host, you will not be luckier, but you might gain info you shouldnt know about. I like to talk.
Abilities:
- When you play this. delete a color from the game you are playing.
- When a card of your color is drawn, the color is replaced with a <:rgby:1107167371048788028>
- You may change this color at any time.
